intro: Ryania riedeliana, commonly known as the yellow ryania, is a flowering plant native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its compound leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-white flowers. The plant produces distinctive, spiny fruits that enclose its seeds. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive foliage and unique fruit structure. Ryania riedeliana is also known for its potential medicinal properties in traditional herbal medicine.
